# topShelfItems

**Instance Property**

Returns an array of content items to be displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
var topShelfItems: [TVContentItem] { get }
```

## Discussion

If the value is an empty array, the system falls back to the static image provided with the app.

## Implementing TV Services Extension Properties

- **topShelfStyle**: The user interface style that should be used to display the content items.
- **TVTopShelfContentStyle**: An enumerated type used to specify the style in which you want your content to be displayed.
